channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: Korea arrests suspects selling intimate videos from hacked IP cameras
item.description: The Korean National Police have arrested four individuals suspected of hacking over 120,000 IP cameras across the country and then selling stolen footage to a foreign adult site. [...]...
